Small dataset referencing the current date

Source: R/demo-data.R
demo_data.Rd

Small dataset referencing the current date

demo_data(n = 10, by = "-2 month")

Arguments

n

number of rows to return

by

string indicating the unit of time between dates in seq.Date(..., by = )

Examples

demo_data()
#> # A tibble: 10 × 5
#>    group sales count on_sale date      
#>    <chr> <dbl> <dbl>   <dbl> <date>    
#>  1 a       101    35       1 2022-05-20
#>  2 a       102    34       0 2022-03-20
#>  3 b       103    33       1 2022-01-20
#>  4 b       104    32       0 2021-11-20
#>  5 c       105    31       1 2021-09-20
#>  6 c       106    30       0 2021-07-20
#>  7 d       107    29       1 2021-05-20
#>  8 d       108    28       0 2021-03-20
#>  9 e       109    27       1 2021-01-20
#> 10 e       110    26       0 2020-11-20
